channel.title: Shop prices different in different shops 667
channel.description: How can i make it so like, dragon boots in the pk shop are 10 pkp, but then in the melee armour shop they are 20,000,000? I think it would be something like: if.shop=12 getprice.item (11732, 20000000) for example, But i dont know what the code is.. as you can tell from that code ^^ im not to good at coding.. Any help would be greatly appreciated. BTW my source is Zenith 667
